Controversial opinion, I dislike this game. 

There's genuinely a lot to like about the game, but there's enough about it that I find unpleasant enough to spoil my enjoyment.  Throughout the game there is a ton of dialogue from GlaDoS and a lot of it is bitter, petty and mean.  It gets old very fast and grates.  Wheatley the other main character also gets old fast.  I just want to mute the dialogue and get rid of the plot entirely and just do the puzzles.

The puzzles are mostly good but there are too many instances where its less about puzzling something out, and more about being lucky enough to notice some obscure distant surface you need to portal to.  This also gets old fast.
Хорошая игра, даже в наше время выглядит достаточно красиво, интересный сюжет, игра заставляет думать, просчитывать, всем советую пройти

Úžasná logická hra která mě i po skoro 10 letech stále baví. Dokazuje to i 98% recezní jsou kladné. Hra má dobrý příběh a pokud si ho chcete užít doporučuju si zahrát i Portal 1. Nehrál jsem sice coop protože neznám nikoho kdo by jsi ho se mnou zahrát ale podle recenzí věřím že je taky dobrý. Ve slevách za 2 eura je úžasná koupě.

Благодаря этой игре у меня встаёт на порталы.

Portal 2 is an absolutely amazing game that adds so much new and exciting content from the previous one! It is the perfect mix between tricky puzzles, comedy, and first-person platforming. Definitely add this game to your wish-list.

Portal 2 builds up a steady level of difficulty, perfect for beginners looking to become pros. The lengthiness of it keeps you entertained for days, and there's always more to explore! I especially love the ups and downs of the story-line and the little laughs sprinkled in here and there.

I give this game a big ⭐10/10!

poggers
fantastic

[h1]Amazingly Well Done[/h1]

It's all already been said, but if you haven't tried this gem, you owe it to yourself to try it. Superb level/world design, fun characters with excellent voice-overs, and very well thought out puzzles. Throw in community levels, co-op and developer commentary and it's hard to find anything wrong or missing with the game.

I have this game on my xbox 360 and now my computer, and I have to say this is one of the best games ever made. Yeah there might be some glitches, but that makes it amazing. I've been playing this game for years and the story is amazing and I'm glad I have it on steam so I will have it forever on my computer. So if you are thinking of buying it you should.

Every once in a while, there comes a different game. 
A game that doesn't set new standards, but simply gives us a new experience in such a manner, it easily becomes one of the most popular games of all times.

Portal is one of those games.
I've finished them both and I don't even need to write a long and detailed review about these games.

Pros:
All of it

Cons:
None of it

Neutral:
Play the damn Portal games, they both have [b]must play[/b] status!

Portal 2'yi daha önce yayıncılardan vesaire duymuştum. Bir gün indirimde denk geldim. Satın aldım. Ardından zaman zaman yeniden dönüp baktığım nadir oyunlardan oldu. Bulmaca çözmeyi seviyorsanız tavsiye ederim. Oyun safi bulmaca oyunu değil. Oyunun bir de hikayesi ve bu hikayede yer alan karakterler var. Diyaloglar, espriler çok güzel. Oyunun hikayesi dışında bir de diğer oyuncuların tasarladığı bulmacaları çözebiliyor, siz de detaylı bir şekilde bulmaca tasarlayabiliyorsunuz.
Najlepsza gra od Valve

You wake up and funny robot helps you get funny portal gun. You accidentally wake up GLADOS and she gets mad. You and funny robot team up to kill GLADOS (again). Funny robot does a mean and throws you back into the 1980's. You have to team up with Marty MC Fly and escape. You then go back to the big funny robot and throw hands. You get blown up and get free a trip to the Moon. Funny robot decides he likes space and wants to stay there forever.

Um dos melhores jogos de puzzle que eu ja joguei na minha vida! Historia incrivel,puzzles desafiadores e é muito divertido

I mean, it's portal. It's amazing. And it makes me feel completely f*cking dumb for taking so long to solve some of the chambers. GLaDOS calling me fat doesn't help. 

Just kidding. GLaDOS is amazing and I love every single insult she throws my way.

It's a bigger game then the first one. It took me longer to beat, and the chambers seem bigger. I also think it's more diffucult. Or maybe that's just me. I love the new mechanics of the gel. 

Now I just wish I had some friends to play the multiplayer with.

good story, good voice acting, good puzzels and good ending

Игра замечательная, но из-за постоянных перемещений, с помощью замечательных порталов, всё содержимое моего замечательного желудка оказалось на моей замечательной клавиатуре и на моём не менее замечательном коврике. После пришла моя мама и дала мне п*зды за то, что я ещё испортил её замечательный ковролин.
Думаю после уборки всего этого - я продолжу играть в эту замечательную игру. Я выражаю искреннюю благодарность разработчикам, ведь они мне подарили такие приключения на мой вечер.
Лучшее

хуй пи ська

Bonjour, au tour de ce jeu que j'ai finis trop de fois,
En effet, j'ai dû finir trois fois le solo et presque autant le mode coop, ce jeu est juste trop bien, l'humour des personnage hilarant et les énigmes qui font bien réfléchir et qui sont vraiment compliqué par moment, il m'arrive encore de bloquer sur certains passages.
Mais Portal 2 reste un jeu super que je vous conseille avec plaisir et avec le sourire !
